summary:
Sword(Atlantean). 
1. Rabidsharks texture from Cokla and Mr. Daves (Conanswords).
2. Cruzz011 texture Atlantean Sword Rusty and Greatsword Rusty Version.
3. Rhevns original (AWESOME) Atlantean Sword Retexture.
descriptionHtml:
Enjoy these amazing textures for this sword,  CONAN THE BARBARIAN 1982 MOVIE

 This is more an idea than a mod. It is a compliment and thank you to all the original modders of the Fabled \"Atlantean Sword\".
 

*****READ PLEASE******
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*****INSTALLATION*****: 3 files, 3 swords, 3 differnet beautiful textures. Best to use NMM or manually Drop in your Skyrim\\\\Data folder if you know what you are doing:)

They are all craftable and upgradable at any forge under steel. 

ALL VERSIONS come with a 1 handed and 2 handed sword version and can be bought from some blacksmiths like Alvor (Riverwood) and the Skyforge Blacksmith. 

****RABIDSHARKS: has its own .esp file.

****CRUZ AND RHEVNS: USE THE SAME .ESP FILE, 

So you have to choose which is to your taste, but all three textures are excellent.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



I reaaly hope no one has a problem with this. I did it because I am a huge conan the barbarian fan and wanted to give his sword with all 3 of the best textures in one place for all CONAN FANS AND FANS OF ALL THE MODDERS WHO MADE THIS POSSIBLE. 

Credit to Modders who made this possible:

Starting with Walax designer/modder fom Oblivion version 1.0 --->Utilzer;s Atlantean 1.5 (WHO GAVE PERMISSION TO EVERYONE ON BETHESDA FORUM!) --->Rhevns Atlantean Re-texture and Cokla and Mr. Dave(Conan Swords). And for the generous gentlemen CRUZ011 who made the spectacular Rusty Version.  


A BIG, BIG THANK YOU FROM ME:)
author: GPM26 and the modders who created all the files
